Laying the Groundwork for 2020

Wednesday, March 18, 12 – 2 p.m.
Wednesday, March 25, 6 – 8 p.m.
ACLU of Northern CA office
39 Drumm St.
San Francisco, CA 94111

RSVP Today

{include "default_salutation"} –

I hope you can join us at the ACLU of Northern California office in San Francisco for a briefing and conversation about our plans for 2020.

As you receive this email, you will be weighing your decision on who to vote for in the California primary. If you are like me, you are probably taking in a lot of news about what is at stake in the country in this election year.

We want to gather soon after the primary to share with you an overview of ACLUâ€™s work this year. We will cover some of the key nationwide priorities of the ACLU, including protecting the right to vote. We will also share with you some of the critically important work in California itself, including on criminal justice reform and access to reproductive health care.

Thanks for sticking with us,

Abdi Soltani
Executive Director, ACLU of {affiliate_name}

P.S. Due to limited space, we request that you only RSVP for one of these events. Both events will feature the same program. The March 18 event includes lunch; the March 25 event includes a light dinner.
